feast.sdk.resources.entity¶

Classes

Entity([name, description, tags]) Wrapper class for feast entity
class feast.sdk.resources.entity.Entity(name='', description='', tags=[])[source]¶

Wrapper class for feast entity

create_feature(name, value_type, owner, description)[source]¶

Create a feature related to this entity

Parameters:
  • name (str) – feature name
  • value_type (feast.types.ValueType_pb2.ValueType) – value type of the feature
  • owner (str) – owner of the feature
  • description (str) – feature’s description
dump(path)[source]¶
Dump the feature into a yaml file.
It will replace content of an existing file.
Parameters:path (str) – destination file path
classmethod from_yaml(path)[source]¶

Create an instance of entity from a yaml file

Parameters:path (str) – path to yaml file
